Name.description: The name of the VPC Endpoint
Name.markdownDescription:
The name of the VPC Endpoint

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 3  
Maximum Length: 32  
Pattern: ^[a-z][a-z0-9-]{2,31}$  
Update requires: Replacement

items.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^[\w+\-]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

SecurityGroupIds.description: The ID of one or more security groups to associate with the endpoint network interface
SecurityGroupIds.markdownDescription:
The ID of one or more security groups to associate with the endpoint network interface

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

items.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 32  
Pattern: ^subnet-([0-9a-f]{8}|[0-9a-f]{17})$  
Update requires: No interruption

SubnetIds.description: The ID of one or more subnets in which to create an endpoint network interface
SubnetIds.markdownDescription:
The ID of one or more subnets in which to create an endpoint network interface

---

Required: Yes  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

VpcId.description: The ID of the VPC in which the endpoint will be used.
VpcId.markdownDescription:
The ID of the VPC in which the endpoint will be used.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 255  
Pattern: ^vpc-[0-9a-z]*$  
Update requires: Replacement

Id.description: The identifier of the VPC Endpoint
Id.markdownDescription:
The identifier of the VPC Endpoint

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 255

Update requires: No interruption
